context.domain: economics, social sciences, anthropology, sociology, geography
context.process: demographics, time series, land coverage, gender distribution, age distribution, census data

variables.Region/Country/Area: dimension. spatial, location. nations in the world, represents 235 UN-recognized countries and states. country
variables.Year: dimension. time. year, not collected regularly, every 3-5 years; 2005, 2010, 2017, and 2020 but include others too. year
variables.Population aged 0 to 14 years old (perce: fact. ratio. percentage of people aged less than 14. population_under_14
variables.Population aged 60+ years old (percentag: fact. ratio. percentage of people aged more than 60. population_over_60
variables.Population density: fact. count per area. derived. average number of people living in one square km. population_density
variables.Population mid-year estimates (millions): fact. count. number of millions of people in the whole country. mid-year estimate. population
variables.Population mid-year estimates for female: fact. count. number of millions of women in the whole country. mid-year estimate. population_female
variables.Population mid-year estimates for males: fact. count. number of millions of men in the whole country. mid-year estimate. population_male
variables.Sex ratio (males per 100 females): fact. ratio. derived. percentage of men as compared to women, number of 100s of men per 100 women. gender_ratio
variables.Surface area (thousand km2): fact. area. total surface area covered by country. area

size.description: 991 records. a few year-wise records per country, mostly 4 but upto 9. time resolution is roughly 5 years; year-wise records and about 5 years apart. years are usually 2005, 2010, 2017, and 2020 but include others too. location spans 235 UN nations and countries including disputed ones. location resolution is the nations and countries mentioned in the location variable
